title: soft, organic font
content:
Hello,  
I am looking for a very simple font but having a hard time finding something with a tad bit of personality also. I need it to be sans serif (mostly), perfect circle Os, and a soft organic quality to it. I have been using Gotham and Kurosawa sans so I am looking for something along those lines. I might try out a serif too as long as it doesn't feel "heavy" which is the problem I am having while using the more legible bold gotham. I don't think I want it too flowy, just soft, delicate.

(This is my first time posting here so please excuse any breaking of protocol. I searched for this topic but wasn't able to find a particular posting so if it already exists, please do point me to it. Thanks!)
author: nidhi

comments.content:
It sounds like you're looking for a humanist typeface, which almost never have perfectly circular 'o's. So depending on how important that criteria is, here are some soft, organic sans serifs:

[Cronos](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415223906/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Cronos)  
 [FF Strada](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415223906/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_strada_text/)  
 [Fresco Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415223906/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Fresco%20Sans)  
 [Freight Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415223906/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/garagefonts/freight_sans/)

wow! Thanks guys!  
I am checking these slowly. I LOVE Omnes.

I know my criteria lean towards some very basic characteristics but still some of these fonts have great character
Storm's [Sebastian](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415223906/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/families-42-sebastian "Sebastian from Storm Type") comes to mind.
FS Albert does have a politely soft feel to it but not marker-ish which I like. The O's are just not perfect circle enough :/ I might try it in the layout anyways.
[FF Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415223906/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=FF%20Info) always seemed like a cousin to FS Albert, at least at a quick glance.
